statements: ALTER TABLE Manufacturing ADD COLUMN date_of_manufacture DATE
ALTER TABLE Manufacturing MODIFY COLUMN quantity INT NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE Manufacturing DROP COLUMN price
ALTER TABLE Manufacturing.Part ADD COLUMN part_cost FLOAT;
ALTER TABLE Manufacturing.Supplier ADD CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_part FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing.Part(part_id);
ALTER TABLE Manufacturing.Supplier ADD COLUMN supplier_address STRING;
ALTER TABLE manufacturer ADD COLUMN email STRING
ALTER TABLE product ADD COLUMN quantity INT
ALTER TABLE order ADD COLUMN status STRING
ALTER TABLE product ADD COLUMN inventory_count INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE manufacturer ADD COLUMN location VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE production ADD COLUMN status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending';
